# init(attributedTitle:categoryOrder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a categorical data axis with the specified attributed title and an array of categories in the specified order.

## Declaration

```swift
init(attributedTitle: NSAttributedString, categoryOrder: [String])
```

## Creating a categorial data axis

- **init(title:categoryOrder:)**: Creates a categorical data axis with the specified title and an array of categories in the specified order.

items.description: Creates a categorical data axis with the specified title and an array of categories in the specified order.
items.name: init(title:categoryOrder:)
